Package edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.edison.utilities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConcretenessScorer
    A concreteness scorer based on the ratings of Brysbaert et al.
    NomLexEntry  
    NomLexReader
    Read NomLex from S-expressions
    POSBaseLineCounter
    A baseline counter simply builds a table by counting the number of times that each form-POS association appear in a source corpus.
    POSMikheevCounter
    A poor man's Mikheev rules implementation, in that there is no morphology.
